Text: Hi wherever you are and you simply can´t get better than this about GTA Vice City game , it is complete with full audio and have the special MOD work well known already GTA NFS Underground available , both with a very friendly Language Selector Interface ... for this game the player simply can´t get better than this ... happy games to all of you ...
